titleStmt.title: A packe of Spanish lyes sent abroad in the vvorld: first printed in Spaine in the Spanish tongue, and translated out of the originall. Now ripped vp, vnfolded, and by iust examination condemned, as conteyning false, corrupt, and detestable wares, worthy to be damned and burned.

A packe of Spanish lyes sent abroad in the vvorld: first printed in Spaine in the Spanish tongue, and translated out of the originall. Now ripped vp, vnfolded, and by iust examination condemned, as conteyning false, corrupt, and detestable wares, worthy to be damned and burned.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A translation of and reply to an untraced Spanish original printed in Seville.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
